articles.content: The Yankees return from a much-needed All-Star break after stumbling into the Midsummer Classic. This whole season could be described as somewhat of a stumble, but the Yankees have a soft landing spo… [+3380 chars]

articles.author: John Newby
articles.title: NASCAR Friday schedule at New Hampshire Motor Speedway - NBC Sports
articles.description: The NASCAR Xfinity Series and NASCAR Whelen Modified Tour are both on track Friday at New Hampshire Motor Speedway.
articles.content:
The NASCAR Xfinity Series is on track Friday at New Hampshire Motor Speedway
 in preparation for Saturday afternoons race.
